meta.title: Digg - What the Internet is talking about right now

div.div: AND PLAY IT WITH 'THE WIZARD OF OZ'

div.a: The Subversive Message Within South Korea's Music Video Sensation

div.div: Beneath the catchy dance beat and hilarious scenes of Seoul's poshest neighborhood, there might be a subtle message about wealth, class, and value in South Korean society.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Pemx4T&via=Digg&text=The Subversive Message Within South Korea's Music Video Sensation

div.a: Dazzling Map Shows More Than 150 Years Of Hurricanes

div.div: A new map done up in glowing colors reveals the swirling paths hurricanes and tropical storms have tread across our planet since 1851.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SsNl6n&via=Digg&text=Dazzling Map Shows More Than 150 Years Of Hurricanes

div.a: This Is What The Music of Cypress Hill Looks Like Played Through A Squid

div.div: Squids are one of many animals capable of changing color when they feel threatened, frightened, or just need to be a little dressier, but while many animals can change color, almost none can do it as quickly as squid.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/OaWWfK&via=Digg&text=This Is What The Music of Cypress Hill Looks Like Played Through A Squid

div.a: Gawker Releases 950 Pages Of Romney Financial Documents

div.div: Gawker has obtained a massive cache of confidential financial documents that shed a great deal of light on Romney's finances, and on the tax-dodging tricks available to the hyper-rich that he has used to keep his effective tax rate at roughly 13% over the last decade.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SrJ9Cv&via=Digg&text=Gawker Releases 950 Pages Of Romney Financial Documents

div.a: New Washable Keyboard Can Handle Your Spills

div.div: Look at your keyboard right now. Is it littered with dust, food crumbs, maybe some sticky residue from a spilled soda? It’s not easy cleaning in between the keys, but you also don’t want to be typing on a petri dish of germs.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SosShu&via=Digg&text=New Washable Keyboard Can Handle Your Spills

div.a: Fox News IDs Navy Seal Behind Bin Laden Book

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/O9gXQl&via=Digg&text=Fox News IDs Navy Seal Behind Bin Laden Book

div.a: New Best Buy CEO Gets $6.25 Million Even If He Can't Get Visa

div.div: Earlier this week, Best Buy unveiled a new CEO in the form of hotel/restaurant exec Hubert Joly. And now come the details of just how well Joly will be compensated -- even if he is never able to actually do the job he's been hired to do.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/P11DdL&via=Digg&text=New Best Buy CEO Gets $6.25 Million Even If He Can't Get Visa

div.a: 'Wiki Weapon Project' Aims To Create A Gun Anyone Can 3D-Print At Home

div.div: Cody Wilson has a simple dream: To design the world’s first firearm that can be downloaded from the Internet and built from scratch using only a 3D printer–and then to share it with the world.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/R3ocJQ&via=Digg&text='Wiki Weapon Project' Aims To Create A Gun Anyone Can 3D-Print At Home

div.div: Microsoft has just unveiled a new look and feel to its corporate logo. Following 25 years from its first introduction, this is the first major Microsoft logo change in the company's history.

div.a: Why Fox News Anchors Wear So Much Makeup

div.div: For a contingent of female bloggers, ideologues, advocates, pundits, and writers, a Fox gig brings with it an unexpected dilemma: Will I really go on national television looking like a cross between Captain Jack Sparrow and a waitress from Hooters?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SXAwgq&via=Digg&text=Why Fox News Anchors Wear So Much Makeup

div.div: Want your kids to be altruistic, tolerant, and open-minded? Expose them to the arts.

div.a: How Syria's Dictator Creates An Alternate Reality On Facebook

div.div: Assad's Facebook page is a shocking look into what a leader's social media presence looks like in a time of national chaos.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/P3pjOz&via=Digg&text=How Syria's Dictator Creates An Alternate Reality On Facebook

div.a: Caribbean Islands Heading For The Atlantic

div.div: For the past 50 million years, the isles of the Caribbean, including Puerto Rico, Hispaniola, Barbados and many smaller islands, have been very slowly moving east towards the Atlantic.

div.a: Starbucks Biorefinery Turns Coffee Waste Into Plastic

div.div: Starbucks Hong Kong is trying out a new biorefinery, breaking down stale bakery products and coffee grounds into a sugary mixture that can be used for manufacturing.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/OsPlYq&via=Digg&text=Starbucks Biorefinery Turns Coffee Waste Into Plastic

div.div: There comes a moment when the pain and despair of constantly running into a huge wall, of realizing that there is no way out of poverty, crushes human beings.
